name: The case of a thousand faces
name_original: The case of a thousand faces
description:
The case of a thousand faces is a horror genre interactive story.

You play the character Roland Ainsfield a paranormal detective, that's been invited to return to Marbrook Manor by an old acquaintance Lady Pembrook, alongside a group of investigators,  in order to finally solve case 1442.

This game is a student project,  feedback is welcome, please bear in mind the restrictions put in place limited the content within the game.
